---
title: "Analysis of Education in Presidential Preferences in New England"
author: "John Curran"
date: "10 October 2020"
output: pdf_document
---

This is an analysis of the correlation of college education and vote preference in New England.

```{r}
library(readxl)
statedata <- read_excel("~/NESwings.xlsx")
attach(statedata)

model2016 <- lm(SWING2016~COLLEGE2018)
model1996 <- lm(SWING1996~COLLEGE1990)
```
```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
plot(COLLEGE2018, SWING2016)
plot(COLLEGE1990, SWING1996)
```
```{r}
summary(model2016)
summary(model1996)
```


```{r}
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(model2016, 1)
plot(model2016, 2)
plot(model1996, 1)
plot(model1996, 2)
```


```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
hist(model2016$residuals)
hist(model1996$residuals)
```
